channel.title: Eclipse error
channel.description:
Hello everyone,
I get an error and I have no idea on how to fix this one, let me explain it. When I try to run the server on eclipse it gives me this error: [img]http://i.imgur.com/VyFAlRP.png[/img]
But when I run it just with the .bat file it works fine?
Does anyone know how to fix this, as I want to code it on eclipse.
Thanks,
NickB

item.title: Eclipse error
item.dc:creator: @nickb nickb
item.description:
@nickb wrote:

Ashi:

You might already be running the server or a application such as uTorrent might be using that port.

Yeah I had it already running haha, thanks for your help!

Read full topic

item.title: Eclipse error
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi

@Ashi wrote:

You might already be running the server or a application such as uTorrent might be using that port.

item.title: Eclipse error
item.dc:creator: @nickb nickb
item.description:
@nickb wrote:

Ashi:

You might of not added the external libraries to the project. If you have like a deps or libs folder etc., it might be in there. In eclipse right click on the jar files and click add to project or add to build path (forgot the name of the option).

Iâ€™ve done that but now I get an other error when I try to run it:

Read full topic

You might of not added the external libraries to the project. If you have like a deps or libs folder etc., it might be in there. In eclipse right click on the jar files and click add to project or add to build path (forgot the name of the option).
